title: Enlarge game images and trigger video on click

requirements.summary: Increase the size of game images in GameCard component to make them more prominent in the display
acceptanceCriteria: Game images are visibly larger than current size
Images remain properly proportioned and do not overflow their containers
Layout adjusts appropriately to accommodate larger images

file_operations.description: Increase the height constraint on the game image element to make it more prominent. Adjust the container dimensions to accommodate the larger image while maintaining proper proportions and preventing overflow. Ensure the image scales appropriately within the card layout and remains responsive across different screen sizes.

requirements.summary: Change video trailer behavior in GameCard so that the video only plays when user clicks on the game image, not automatically
acceptanceCriteria: Video trailer does not autoplay when GameCard is rendered
Clicking on the game image triggers the video trailer to start playing
Video player controls remain accessible after click-to-play is initiated

file_operations.description: Remove autoplay attribute from the video element to prevent automatic playback. Add click event handler to the game image that triggers video playback when clicked. Implement state management to track video play status and ensure the video player controls remain accessible after the user initiates playback. The implementation should provide clear visual feedback that the image is clickable and will start the video trailer.
